arStrings.szText: He was right, you know. I was keeping things from him. Didn't think he could handle it. Still don't, heh. But if, if I knew he'd turn, I... Hmm. No. No, I would not have.
As if in the middle of a long thought. Upset, but still sure of his leadership.
I would have done the same if I was him. If I thought he was putting Backwater in danger, if he was cutting me out after all we’ve been through together.
But, that doesn’t matter now. Because Backwater needs me. Backwater is me. And I shall do what I must to keep this place alive.
I'd be dead without you, y'know? So here, threw in a bit extra. Drinks are on me.
